title: "Course Schedule"

This page contains the course schedule with links to all materials. Materials
will be posted as the course progresses.

::: {.callout-warning}
## Schedule Subject to Change
This schedule is tentative. Topics and due dates may be adjusted as the semester
progresses. Check [Ed Discussion](https://edstem.org/us/courses/90354/discussion/) for announcements.
:::

::: {.callout-note}
Weekly worksheets are Jupyter notebooks released on Tuesdays and due the following Monday.
Work on them in Friday discussion sections and complete them at home.
Submit on [Gradescope](https://www.gradescope.com/courses/1206670). Solutions are
posted on [bCourses](https://bcourses.berkeley.edu/courses/1551142) after the due date.
:::
